Tech Specs:


Features
This powerful Mac data recovery application provides a good balance of simplicity and advanced recovery features to suit a broad spectrum of Mac users. Mentioned below are some salient features of the software:
 
Mac Data Recovery
Stellar Mac Data Recovery brings you plenty of functionality at your fingertips to help safely recover everything you lost on your Mac. You can retrieve irreplaceable files on your hard drive lost due to media formatting, accidental deletion, malicious software attack or other similar issues. The tool's easy-to-use approach coupled with the ability to perform different recovery options (Quick Recovery, Deleted Recovery, Formatted Media & Search Lost Volume) helps you make the most of this data recovery application. The program can also bypass your corrupt directory to find file fragments, add them up to build meaningful data, and recover everything with ease.
Deleted File Recovery
The software makes it exceedingly simple to undelete all your files, folders, documents even after completely emptying the Trash or by hitting 'Command+Shift+Option+Delete'. The software works flawlessly to scan any large Mac volume or drive for deleted files. With advanced deleted Mac file recovery capabilities; this utility can now recover all your recently deleted files with their original names. Stellar PhoenixÃ‚Â® is the first in the world to introduce this feature for deleted file recovery. No matter how your data has been compromised, Phoenix Mac Data Recovery is there for you, ready to get you back everything as you want.
 
Deleted Volume Recovery
Recover lost or deleted volumes on your Mac with minimum fuss using this Mac recovery application. If you no longer see existing volumes on your iMac, Mac Pro, MacBook Pro, MacBook Air, or Mac Mini, the software can locate and rebuild those deleted volumes conveniently to help you get your valuable data back. The software can recover your entire volumes deleted from any HFS, HFS+, FAT, NTFS, or ExFAT formatted drive.
Raw Recovery
The application has a built-in fingerprint of every common file type that helps better recognize different types of files stored on your hard drive and conveniently perform data recovery based on file signatures. With advanced Raw Recovery feature, you can recover more than 122 different file types with the software. This feature is very useful when your volume file system is severely corrupt.
 
Mac Photo Recovery
Recover lost, deleted or formatted photos from any internal or external Mac hard drive, USB drive, digital camera, memory card, SD card, flash card, etc. With improved features of data recovery Mac software, you can even recover all your photos of any specific file type.

System Startup Disc
The tool acts as a data rescuer even when your system fails the boot process. This Data recovery Mac software is available with a Bootable system startup DVD that comes handy in times of boot failure. You can start your Mac system with the help of this Bootable DVD and use Stellar PhoenixÃ‚Â® to scan & regain access to all your lost data.
 
Recover Data from NTFS Partitions on Mac
The ultimate usability of the software is realized with its support for Boot Camp partition recovery. The software supports data recovery from NTFS partitions on Mac and gives you a hassle-free experience when recovering files from Windows Boot Camp partition. Regardless of whether your Mac is setup as a standard Boot Camp dual-partitioned disk, you can have your best shot at recovering lost data from Windows partitions on Mac.
Create Image
Stellar PhoenixÃ‚Â® Mac Data Recovery includes a suite of free additional utilities for data safety, one of which is 'Create Image'. When your media develops bad sectors and there are chances of impending drive failure, you can create and keep mountable image of your Mac hard drive, volume, or selected region so that even in case of media failure, you will have a complete backup.

 
Recovery from FAT and ExFAT Formatted Drives/Volumes
The application can safely claw back your files lost from FAT or ExFAT formatted drives and volumes. The software introduces two levels of scans for FAT and ExFAT volumes - 'Quick Scan' and 'Deep Scan'. 'Quick Scan' runs an extremely fast scan to uncover all your disappeared files in a flash, while 'Deep Scan', though time-intensive, performs a thorough sector-by-sector scan to dig out all the data lost from the drive.

Resume Recovery
Ã¢â‚¬ËœResume RecoveryÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ is very helpful and important feature to recover data from the image file (.dmg) created at any LATER point of time. This user-friendly software allows you to restore lost or deleted data from any previously created image file of the corresponding Mac media. Under any instance of media failure, with the resume recovery option, you can resume the previously Ã¢â‚¬ËœSaved Scan InformationÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ or Ã¢â‚¬ËœDrive ImageÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ to restore your lost or inaccessible data back.
 
Optical Media Recovery
With this Mac recovery solution, you get the ability to easily grab all your seemingly inaccessible files stored on damaged or improperly burnt optical media (CD, DVD, HD DVD, Blu-ray Disc etc). The software supports recovery from all common file systems of optical media, such as ISO 9660, Joliet, UDF, HFS and RockRidge.

Preview During Scan
While the software scans your media behind the scenes, you can see your images, songs, and videos displayed in the main interface on the fly. If you want, you can hide this on-the-fly preview by deselecting the option from preferences. In addition, after completion of the scanning process, the software allows to right click on any recoverable file and see its preview using Quick Look.
 
iPod Data Recovery
Recover your lost/deleted music files, videos, photos, pod casts etc. from any Mac supported storage media, including iPods, USB drives etc. With this Mac file recovery software, you can easily recover all your precious data from IPod Classic and Shuffle.
Simple and Interactive GUI
Now the Mac recovery software has simpler and more appealing graphical user interface. Moreover, with detailed instructions for each step of data recovery, the software can be used by any user without needing any further technical assistance.

 
Selective Recovery
On completion of the scanning process, the software lists all recoverable files and folders in a tree-view, from which you can check mark the required ones to perform selective recovery. Here, the software provides an easy recovery option with which you can simply right click on the selected files or folders and recover them.
